Title: Authorizes certified school psychologists to participate in the certification of certain persons as intellectually disabled or developmentally disabled
Summary: Authorizes certified school psychologists to participate in the certification of certain persons as intellectually disabled or developmentally disabled; makes technical corrections to language.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the surrogate's court procedure act, in relation to authorizing certified school psychologists to participate in the certification of certain persons as intellectually disabled or developmentally disabled
